Description:
Change to authentication method could be an indicator of an attacker adding an auth method to the account so they can have continued access.

Author: AlertIQ
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Change to Authentication Method
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where loggedbyservice = 'authentication methods' and category = 'usermanagement' and operationname = 'user registered security info'
